body_html: Hi @tfboyd, I often see that image classification models use synchronous data parallelism that at the end of the day has the same effect of using large batch sizes. I guess a comparison between asynchronous and synchronous updates in terms of final obtainable accuracy and time saved in synchronization could be interesting.
